steps.text: Settings → Mobile Data → Add eSIM → Use QR Code.
Scan the QR from EE and follow prompts.

tips: Keep Wi‑Fi on; wait 2–5 minutes after profile install.

steps.text: Text PAC to 65075 on your current network.
Provide PAC to EE (order journey or account portal).

notes: PAC valid 30 days; port completes on working days.
